SmartAttendance
Portal Login

How It Works

A seamless, secure process from face recognition to verified attendance

1

Student Enters Classroom

Student approaches the attendance terminal at classroom entrance

2

Face is Scanned

Real-time face detection and recognition using advanced AI

3

ID Card is Scanned

Student presents ID card for QR/barcode/ID number scanning

4

Face + ID Cross-Match

System verifies face matches the ID card holder's data

5

Anti-Proxy Validation

Multiple checks ensure attendance legitimacy and no proxy attempts

6

Attendance Stored Securely

Verified attendance is recorded in tamper-resistant database
